channel.title: Chronohaze Updates
channel.description: Latest updates from Chronohaze: mathematics notes, music releases, and photography archives.

item.title: Metalcore Piano Lab | From Audio to Chart: A Discretization Experiment (WIP)
item.description: From continuous audio to playable chart events: detection, estimation, segmentation, alignment, and interaction.

item.title: Spring 2026 | A New Research Direction
item.description: Research notes on optimization, first-order methods, and transitioning from formal verification to open-ended research.

item.title: An Ongoing Isabelle Research Project: Formalising Submodular Greedy
item.description: Formalisation progress toward the (1 − 1/e) greedy approximation guarantee for monotone submodular maximization.

item.title: My First Isabelle Formalization Project
item.description: Why formalization matters and how rigorous proof structures are made machine-checkable in Isabelle/HOL.

item.title: Ipomoea Alba (Album Page)
item.description: Album landing page with 14 tracks, concept notes, and direct entry to each track page.

item.title: 「劇場の雨が止む日のどこかで、君に話しかけるつもりだ」 (Album Page)
item.description: HazezZ's teenage years best's collection: selected tracks from early-period writing and production.

item.title: 春日和煦 / Sincerely, Spring
item.description: J-rock color study in pale spring green and blue air, with bilingual lyrics and production notes.

item.title: He and me
item.description: A warm-white epilogue track with bilingual lyric layout and minimal arrangement architecture.

item.title: 花园 / Moonlit Garden
item.description: Night-lullaby writing with dreamlike blue-violet palette, bilingual lyrics, and restrained motion.

item.title: Affizieren
item.description: Deep blue introspective track with long-form production notes, lyrical translation, and arrangement breakdown.

item.title: Photography Collection
item.description: Featured sets + archive structure, including bilingual intro and curated cover updates.

item.title: Blue — A-level photography final piece
item.description: Standalone page for graduation project video under photography archive.
